description: This file defines a Python class 'FirecrawlTools' that provides an interface for web scraping, crawling, mapping, and searching using the Firecrawl API. It includes methods for each operation, handles configuration via constructor parameters, and manages external dependencies such as 'firecrawl' and logging utilities.

classes.name: CustomJSONEncoder
classes.description: A custom JSON encoder that serializes non-serializable objects by converting them to strings.

classes.name: FirecrawlTools
classes.description: A toolkit class providing methods to scrape, crawl, map, and search websites using the Firecrawl API.

methods.name: scrape_website
methods.description: Scrapes a website URL and returns the result as a JSON string.

methods.name: crawl_website
methods.description: Crawls a website URL with an optional limit and returns the result as a JSON string.

methods.name: map_website
methods.description: Maps a website URL and returns the result as a JSON string.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a search query on the web using Firecrawl and returns the results as a JSON string or an error message.
